snippet: Iran asserts that all disagreements have been resolved, though its negotiating partners don’t go so far.
abstract: Iran and a group of six world powers move closer to carrying out the nuclear agreement reached in November, with the Iranian side saying all outstanding issues have been resolved.

byline.contributor: Nick Cumming-Bruce contributed reporting from Geneva, and Michael R. Gordon from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Iran asserts that all disagreements have been resolved, though its negotiating partners don’t go so far.

headline.main: Negotiators Move Closer on Iran Nuclear Pact
headline.print_headline: Negotiators Move Closer On Iran Pact
